logo_header.label: Logo (header)
logo_header.comment: Upload logo image (JPG, PNG or GIF image)

logo_header_mobile.label: Logo for Mobile (header)
logo_header_mobile.comment: Upload logo image (JPG, PNG or GIF image)

logo_footer.label: Logo (footer)
logo_footer.comment: Upload logo image (JPG, PNG or GIF image)

catalog_mode.label: Catalog mode
catalog_mode.comment: Create your shopping cart into simple catalog
catalog_mode.tooltip: This mode turns off add to cart buttons, account profile and cart functionality

font_custom.label: Custom
font_custom.comment:
CSS font name, for ex. :
"Trebuchet MS" or Arial, Verdana, Geneva

font_latin.label: Latin Extended
font_latin.comment: Full list of fonts and font subsets available here Google Fonts.

font_character_subset.label: Custom Font Character Subset
font_character_subset.comment: Full list of fonts and font subsets available here Google Fonts.

black_list.label: Hide Categories in topmenu
black_list.comment: Write categories ids you want to hide, separated by comma

black_list_left.label: Hide Categories in leftmenu
black_list_left.comment: Write categories ids you want to hide, separated by comma

show_add_to_cart.label: Show add to cart button on product rollover

show_add_to_wishlist.label: Show add to wishlist button on product rollover

show_add_to_compare.label: Show add to compare button on product rollover

header_fixed.label: Header fixed
header_fixed.comment: Following header on top of site

header_topline.label: Header Topline
header_topline.comment: Following header on top of site

bg.label: Background parallax image
bg.comment: Default home page. Upload image (JPG, PNG or GIF image)

bg_landing.label: Background parallax image
bg_landing.comment: For Landing Content Layout. Upload image (JPG, PNG or GIF image)

post_parallax_top_image.label: Blog Post Top Parallax Image
post_parallax_top_image.comment: For Landing Content Layout. Upload image (JPG, PNG or GIF image)

prevnext.label: Show Prev/Next buttons
prevnext.comment: That option not works with flat catalog mode enabled

bg.label: Background parallax image
bg.comment: Upload image (JPG, PNG or GIF image) 900x520 px

custom_css.label: Use custom css file
custom_css.comment: To use custom css file you must rename file skin/frontend/welldone/default/css/DELETE-PREFIXcustom_changes.css to custom_changes.css (remove just prefix 'DELETE-PREFIX')
